greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n lists the nontrivial divisors of the n-th composite.
comment: Row n contains row A002808(n) of table A027750.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..1000 of table, flattened
example: The table starts in row n=1 (with the composite 4) as
program: a163870_tabf = filter (not . null) $ map tail a027751_tabf
xref: Cf. A144925 (row lengths), A062825 (row sums), A056608 (left edge), A160180 (right edge).
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Aug 06 2009
ext: Entries checked by _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 22 2009
